data.title: Kiwi Gmail For Mac Support Clicking Links Won'T Open Browser
data.meta_description: We have a community of volunteers ready to help you figure it out.
data.text:
Itll show you where you can find solutions to many common issues and, as always, if you need extra help with any of this, we have a community of volunteers standing by.Consider using it before going through a lengthy troubleshooting process.The Firefox wont start - find solutions article should cover it.

We have a community of volunteers ready to help you figure it out.

We wouldnt have been as excited as we were if it had been as easy as that.

Zive, Inc. collects cookies to make our sites features work properly.

By clicking on I Accept, you consent to the use of these cookies.

You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but it may affect how the website features function.

You can get to it by opening the App Store app on your Mac and searching for Kiwi for Gmail.

The Lite version of Kiwi for Gmail supports one Gmail account and lacks some key features, such as the Do Not Disturb switch, important-only notifications, keyboard shortcuts, and account themes.

You must enter some information first before being able to enter the discount code.

Please enter your Country and zip code then hit the green Continue button.

There, you can add accounts, change their display order, adjust the per-account notification settings, themes, and more.

Some older Macs might run into performance issues, due to their low CPU and Memory setup.

If a new version is available, click on the update button next to the app.

Each plugin will need to be built into our app individually, so we would love to hear which plugins you would like to see supported.

Using your feedback, we can work on including them in our updates.

This can be set-up in the Preferences for Macs Mail App, where you can directly change the default email application.

We would recommend that you restart your Mac after changing the default email application.

Doing this would enable your Gmail account to receive emails from those accounts, which would then appear in Kiwi for Gmail.

Kiwi for Gmail has integrated Google Drive seamlessly, so you can attach files, through Google drive, of up to 1TB each.

This would be limited by your Google Drive size.).

We have done some preliminary investigations and believe that we are the best-positioned company to deliver such a product.

Therefore, we would highly recommend Googles own Gmail apps on any mobile device.

That way, you are guaranteed the same email experience and convenience on both the computer and the mobile device.
